title: Roboton - Robotics Symposium
description: IEEE SIES GST & IEEE DBIT Conducted Roboton Symposium on 15th October 2021 to 17th October 2021.The event received a funding of 10,000 INR. The expenditure incurred was 6000 INR (2000 INR each Gift Vouchers for 3 Speakers) and the balance  amount was distributed among IEEE SIES GST & IEEE DBIT.
